Literature.Title: Identification and Functional Characterization of a Novel Insecticidal Decapeptide from the Myrmicine Ant Manica rubida.
Literature.Author: Heep J, Skaljac M, Grotmann J, Kessel T, Seip M, Schmidtberg H, Vilcinskas A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus megaterium ATCC 14945(no activity data),Bacillus subtilis DSM 10(no activity data),Escherichia coli D31(no activity data),Listeria fleischmannii DSM 24998(no activity data),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 15313(no activity data),Micrococcus luteus DSM 20030(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(no activity data),Moraxella catarrhalis DSM 9143(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(no activity data),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 35984(no activity data),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(no activity data),Acyrthosiphon pisum(90-100% Killing=16000µg/ml),Acyrthosiphon pisum(70-80% Killing=4000µg/ml),Acyrthosiphon pisum(20-30% Killing=1000µg/ml)
